ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
numpy:
- '2'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version
name: libosqp
raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  version: 1.0.0
  qdldlversion: 0.1.8

package:
  name: libosqp
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/osqp/osqp/archive/refs/tags/v${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: dd6a1c2e7e921485697d5e7cdeeb043c712526c395b3700601f51d472a7d8e48
  patches:
    - patches/0001-Use-relative-path-to-testcodes-directory.patch
    # use libqdldl from conda-forge, build interface in osqp directly
    - patches/0002-Link-against-qdldl-shared-library.patch
    - patches/0004-expose-missing-functions-windows-backport-744.patch

build:
  number: 2
requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
    - cmake
    - ninja
    # Unittest source code is generated at build time using numpy and scipy
    - python
    - numpy
    - scipy
  host:
    - libqdldl =${{ qdldlversion }}
  run_exports:
    # No ABI policy is documented, let's be conservative
    - ${{ pin_subpackage('libosqp', upper_bound='x.x.x') }}
  ignore_run_exports:
    by_name:
      - numpy

tests:
  - package_contents:
      lib:
        - osqp
      include:
        - osqp/osqp.h
      files:
        - if: win
          then: |
            Library\lib\cmake\osqp\osqp-config.cmake
          else: |
            lib/cmake/osqp/osqp-config.cmake

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/osqp/osqp
  license: Apache-2.0
  summary: The Operator Splitting QP Solver.
  license_file:
    - LICENSE
    - algebra/_common/lin_sys/qdldl/amd/LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - traversaro
    - h-vetinari
